org.drip.service.api
Class FI

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.service.api.FI

public class FI
extends java.lang.Object

This class exposes all the DRIP API to clients – this class is the main functional interface.

Map of dates and cumulative aggregate notional

MakeBondBasket

public static final BasketBond MakeBondBasket(java.lang.String strName,
                                              java.lang.String[] astrBondId,
                                              double[] adblWeights,
                                              JulianDate dtEffective,
                                              double dblNotional)
Parameters:
strName - Name of the bond basket
astrBondId - Array of bondIdentifiers (CUSIP/ISIN/etc) for the basket components
adblWeights - Basket component weights
dtEffective - Basket Effective Date
dblNotional - Basket Notional
Returns:
The bond basket object

MakeCDX

public static final BasketProduct MakeCDX(java.lang.String strIndex,
                                          JulianDate dt,
                                          java.lang.String strTenor)
Makes an on-the-run CDX product for the given index, the date, and the tenor

Parameters:
strIndex - Index
dt - Current Date
strTenor - Tenor
Returns:
BasketProduct representing the on-the-run CDX

                                          int iSeries,
                                          java.lang.String strTenor)
Makes an on-the-run CDX product for the given index, the series, and the tenor

Parameters:
strIndex - Index
iSeries - Series
strTenor - Tenor
Returns:
BasketProduct representing the on-the-run CDX
